testsuite.name: org.jasome.metrics.calculators.LackOfCohesionMethodsCalculatorSpec

testcase.name: calculate simple LCOM for non-perfect example
calculate simple LCOM sees variable use in for loops
LCOM is undefined when only one method and one field
detects when usages have been shadowed by identically-named variables
detects when usages have been shadowed by identically-named variables outside of the scope in which they are used
simple baseline metric for straight variable access
simple baseline metric for low cohesion
detects shadowing in for loop initializer
baseline for field access when shadowed in lower scope
detects when usages have been shadowed by identically-named variables but still counts the method if it has a genuine access
detects when usages have been shadowed by identically-named variables but still counts the method if it has a genuine access even if shadowed declaration is in different scope from use
detects when usages have been shadowed in else statement
calculate LCOM counts assignments as usages
detects variable shadowing via method parameters
